Web Developer



















Welcome to my portfolio.


My name is Jeremy Jewell and I am a highly motivated and creative web developer specializing in front-end development.

I am proficient JavaScript, React, AJAX, and PHP. Detail-oriented and self-motivated, eager to learn new programming languages and contribute to innovative projects. My diverse background equips me with a unique blend of technical skills, creativity, and effective communication, making me an ideal candidate for your team.

I combine my technical skills and my passion for exploring the historical and social aspects of technology. I have been developing websites with Javascript and React since July 2023, after completing three courses and a skill path from Codecademy. I have also been writing for various publications since 2004, covering the connections between technology and culture.

I have a diverse and rich educational background, and I have published hundreds of articles in different languages and outlets. I bring my lifetime of proven communication skills and broad contextual knowledge to all of my projects.





















Let me tell you about my professional experience.




I have been a freelance web developer since 2023, working with clients to create custom websites and web applications.

In 2016 I founded Opportunity Language Academy, and began developing a custom web application to manage the school's operations, along with interactive educational materials. I have been the lead developer on this project since its inception.

Since 2004 I have also been a freelance writer focusing on the connections between technology and culture. Here are some samples of my published writings:

  • "Decentralization Is an Illusion: A 2023 End-of-Year Look at Web 3.0", Hackernoon, Nov 2023
  • "The Depressing New Corporate Metaverse", Areo, Feb 2023
  • "Satan Is Busy in Knoxville: The Knoxville Sessions, 1929 & 1930 — The Devil’s in the Details", Arts Fuse, Jan 2023
  • "Macroblank’s ANALOG レアリティ– Plenty of Scarcity to Go Around", Arts Fuse, Jan 2023
  • "Los memes cerámicos de Chucho Bedoya", Revista Universidad de Antioquia, Colombia, Jul 2022
  • "Roblox — Exploiting Child Labor in the Metaverse", Arts Fuse, May 2022
  • "Megan Walsh’s The Subplot: Reviewing the State of Contemporary Chinese Literature", The Smart Set, May 2022

Concrete Wally
